snippet: The Internal Revenue Service’s inspector general said that he was expanding his investigation of I.R.S. treatment of political groups that applied for tax-exempt status.
abstract: Internal Revenue Service inspector general Russell George says he is expanding his investigation into IRS handling of tax-exempt applications from Tea Party and other political groups.
lead_paragraph: The Internal Revenue Service’s inspector general said that he was expanding his investigation of I.R.S. treatment of political groups that applied for tax-exempt status.

headline.main: I.R.S. Investigator to Reopen Inquiry Into Applications
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Investigator To Reopen Inquiry Into Applications
